title: Red vs Blue Season 5 DVD ISO RvB
description:
This is the ISO version of Red Vs. Blue: The Blood Gulch Chronicles Season 5 dvd.

Unlike other torrents, this is the real deal here. Its not the low-res movies off their sites, THIS IS THE ACTUAL DVD, WITH ALL BONUS FEATURES INCLUDED

Directions:

Unzip the file
Delete .DS_Store if its there, you dont need it.
Burn only the VIDEO_TS and AUDIO_TS to the root(not in any subfolders) of a dvd using windows explorer, apple finder, linux whatever, or your favorite dvd burning program. NOTE: you do need a dual-layer DVD and a capable drive to do this.

The folder that says do not burn contains hi-res images of the DVD and the dvd case, for lightscribing and labeling purposes.

If you dont have a burner that can burn dual-layer DVDs, some dvd player applications, like the ones that come with all macs can directly play VIDEO_TS folders.



Enjoy and Please Seed!



Ripped with MacTheRipper v. 2.6.6
